verses.verse: Then <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> themselves to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> we are your <S%H6106>bone<s%> and your <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

And <S%H1571>moreover<s%> in <S%H8543>time<s%> <S%H8032>past,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4428>king,<s%> you were he that <S%H3318>led<s%> out and <S%H935>brought<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to you, You shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and you shall be <S%H5057>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Therefore <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> is <S%H2982>Jebus;<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> were, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2982>Jebus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> You shall not <S%H935>come<s%> here. Nevertheless <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4686>castle<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3605>Whoever<s%> <S%H5221>smites<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> shall be <S%H7218>chief<s%> and <S%H8269>captain.<s%> So <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> up, and was <S%H7218>chief.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H4679>castle;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, <S%H5704>even<s%> from <S%H4407>Millo<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about: and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H2421>repaired<s%> the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>waxed<s%> <S%H1980>greater<s%> and <S%H1419>greater:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> was with him.

<S%H428>These<s%> also are the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> had, who <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> themselves with him in his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to make him <S%H4427>king,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H428>this<s%> is the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men <S%H834>whom<s%> David had; <S%H3434>Jashobeam,<s%> an <S%H2453>Hachmonite,<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7991>captains:<s%> he <S%H5782>lifted<s%> up his <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> by him at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6471>time.<s%>
And <S%H310>after<s%> him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo,<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was one of the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%>men.

He was with <S%H1732>David<s%> at <S%H6450>Pasdammim,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> together to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> where was a <S%H2513>parcel<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H8184>barley;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And they <S%H3320>set<s%> themselves in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of that <S%H2513>parcel,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> it, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> them by a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>deliverance.<s%>

Now <S%H7969>three<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7218>captains<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H5725>Adullam;<s%> and the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H4686>hold,<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines'<s%> <S%H5333>garrison<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> at <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H183>longed,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Oh that one would give me <S%H8248>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> that is at the <S%H8179>gate!<s%>

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1234>broke<s%> <S%H1234>through<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> that was by the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> it, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to <S%H1732>David:<s%> but <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of it, but <S%H5258>poured<s%> it out to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2486>forbid<s%> it me, that I should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> thing: shall I <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that have put their <S%H5315>lives<s%> in jeopardy? for with the jeopardy of their <S%H5315>lives<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> it. Therefore he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> it. <S%H428>These<s%> things <S%H6213>did<s%> these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1368>mightiest.<s%>

And <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> he was <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7969>three:<s%> for <S%H5782>lifting<s%> up his <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> he <S%H2490>slew<s%> them, and <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H8034>name<s%> among the <S%H7969>three.<s%>
Of the <S%H7969>three,<s%> he was more <S%H3513>honorable<s%> than the <S%H8147>two;<s%> for he was their <S%H8269>captain:<s%> however, he <S%H935>attained<s%> not to the first <S%H7969>three.<s%>

<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6909>Kabzeel,<s%> who had done <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6467>acts;<s%> he <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> lion <S%H739>like<s%> men of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> also he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> in a <S%H953>pit<s%> in a <S%H7950>snowy<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And he <S%H5221>slew<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of great <S%H4060>stature,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> high; and in the <S%H4713>Egyptian's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> was a <S%H2595>spear<s%> like a <S%H707>weaver's<s%> <S%H4500>beam;<s%> and he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to him with a <S%H7626>staff,<s%> and <S%H1497>plucked<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> out of the <S%H4713>Egyptian's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2026>slew<s%> him with his own <S%H2595>spear.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> things <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada,<s%> and had the <S%H8034>name<s%> among the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%>men.

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> he was <S%H3513>honorable<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> but <S%H935>attained<s%> not to the first <S%H7969>three:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> him <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H4928>guard.<s%>

Also the <S%H1368>valiant<s%> men of the <S%H2428>armies<s%> were, <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%>
<S%H8054>Shammoth<s%> the <S%H2033>Harorite,<s%> <S%H2503>Helez<s%> the <S%H6397>Pelonite,<s%>
<S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6142>Ikkesh<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoite,<s%> <S%H44>Abiezer<s%> the <S%H6069>Antothite,<s%>
<S%H5444>Sibbecai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite,<s%> <S%H5866>Ilai<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%>
<S%H4121>Maharai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> <S%H2466>Heled<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1195>Baanah<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%>

<S%H863>Ithai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7380>Ribai<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> that pertained to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite,<s%>
<S%H2360>Hurai<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash,<s%> <S%H22>Abiel<s%> the <S%H6164>Arbathite,<s%>
<S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%> the <S%H978>Baharumite,<s%> <S%H455>Eliahba<s%> the <S%H8170>Shaalbonite,<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2044>Hashem<s%> the <S%H1493>Gizonite,<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7681>Shage<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite,<s%>
<S%H279>Ahiam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7940>Sacar<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite,<s%> <S%H465>Eliphal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H218>Ur,<s%>
<S%H2660>Hepher<s%> the <S%H4382>Mecherathite,<s%> <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H6397>Pelonite,<s%>
<S%H2695>Hezro<s%> the <S%H3761>Carmelite,<s%> <S%H5293>Naarai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H229>Ezbai,<s%>
<S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> <S%H4006>Mibhar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1905>Haggeri,<s%>

<S%H6768>Zelek<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite,<s%> <S%H5171>Naharai<s%> the <S%H1307>Berothite,<s%> the armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%>
<S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%> <S%H1619>Gareb<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%>
<S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> <S%H2066>Zabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H304>Ahlai,<s%>
<S%H5721>Adina<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7877>Shiza<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenite,<s%> a <S%H7218>captain<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> with him,
<S%H2605>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maachah,<s%> and <S%H3146>Joshaphat<s%> the <S%H4981>Mithnite,<s%>
<S%H5814>Uzzia<s%> the <S%H6254>Ashterathite,<s%> <S%H8091>Shama<s%> and <S%H3273>Jehiel<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2369>Hothan<s%> the <S%H6200>Aroerite,<s%>
<S%H3043>Jediael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8113>Shimri,<s%> and <S%H3109>Joha<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H8491>Tizite,<s%>
<S%H447>Eliel<s%> the <S%H4233>Mahavite,<s%> and <S%H3403>Jeribai,<s%> and <S%H3145>Joshaviah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H493>Elnaam,<s%> and <S%H3495>Ithmah<s%> the <S%H4125>Moabite,<s%>
<S%H447>Eliel,<s%> and <S%H5744>Obed,<s%> and Jasiel the <S%H4677>Mesobaite.<s%>
